summary: Changes the power and drawing speed of every bow and arrow in the game. Some enemies are highly effected with these changes.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8][size=3][center]
This mod changes the stats of every bow and arrow to make them feel more logical, at least in my opinion.

Rather than just increasing the damage of every bow and arrow, I also added some logic. Bows like hunting bow is much faster than normal, also weaker at the same time.

Enemies like Falmers will draw their bows much slower(since they're blind), but it will also dealÂ significantly more.[/center][/size][/color][/font]
author: ProtologolusX
